item.how_to_find_us: We will be located at the rotary Rt. 33 & Westover Road on Memorial Drive in Chicopee. Across from the Arbys. This is a community event sponsored by the Western Mass 912 Project
item.why: Stand out to say thanks to our Troops and their Families. Bring your friends, families, flags, and signs. We will have a tent and table set up for snacks and drinks. Bring your chairs and enjoy a nice afternoon with us as we honor our military.
item.name: ARMED FORCES DAY SUPER RALLY
